pdp.subtitle: An A-line dress with a twist. Made in our breathable LightSpeed fabric featuring an open back with cross straps and a built-in shorts liner with hidden pockets.

productKnowledges.title: Description
productKnowledges.description: An A-line dress with a twist. Made in our breathable LightSpeed fabric featuring an open back with cross straps and a built-in shorts liner with hidden pockets.

productKnowledges.title: Ideal For
productKnowledges.description: All levels of Recreation — think dancing, skateboarding, running, jogging, dog walking. You can do anything in a dress.

productKnowledges.title: How It Fits
productKnowledges.description: A lightweight, A-line dress with cross  straps

properties.description: An A-line dress with a twist. Made in our breathable LightSpeed fabric featuring an open back with cross straps and a built-in shorts liner with hidden pockets.
